thread.title: Sarah-Liz Tierney
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by Sarah-Liz Tierney

author: Sarah-Liz Tierney
title: Sarah-Liz Tierney
text: I purchased the BBG 1&2 and the vegetarian meal helper. I used to be a very active and went to the gym regularly however with a demanding work schedule and a hectic life I lost my healthy routine. This program is great for me because it's realistic and manageable. I'm basically starting from scratch so the pretrain program is extremely helpful in getting back into shape. The workouts are all apx 30 mins so they fit into a busy life style. Overall I am super happy with the program and I would definitely recommend it to others. I do wish the program included some video workouts/examples but the PDF workout guide is easy to understand and follow.
